entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add fallback root certificate bundle #25686
  • Project-level default for await configuration #25685
  • Building net*-android apps always restore Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host.linux #25679
  • Workload update reports failure when manifest packages aren't found on feed #25678
    6.0.4xx
  • With .NET 6.0.301 installed, the sdk version for Maui/wasm-tools is displayed as "6.0.300" in dotnet workload list. #25673
  • Error "Unable to find package about 5.0.18" when creating 5.0 project on VS 17.0/17.2 VAL build which carries 5.0.17 runtime #25672

PullRequests

Created

  • Add fallback root certificate bundle for code signing and timestamping #25687
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adds default outputProperties Item #12030
  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement new flag for ignoreing apphosts in dotnet run #25647
    Area-CLI
